participant_1.background:
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.
I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.

participant_2.background:
I've been in a relationship for 5 years, but I feel like I don't measure up to my partner's standards.
i tried to make it as an actor when i was younger.
i can t get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.
I wake up early to practice my music before my sister and niece and nephew wake up.
i love watching sitcoms on television.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing alright, thanks! I'm just hanging out and relaxing today.
Nice, I'm also just relaxing today. I have to practice my music for a show I'm in this weekend, so I'm taking a little time to get ready for that.
That sounds fun! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar in a rock band. We're playing a show at the local bar this weekend, so I'm pretty excited about that.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure it'll be a great show.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to watch sitcoms and play video games. I also like to go out with my friends and have fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go out with my friends too, but I don't really watch sitcoms or play video games.
That's cool. We could still be friends, right?
